Task: Add ReadDataTableFromSqlServerViaQuery to allow ad-hoc query

Feature: Connection String Support (rather than requiring name)
Task: Add ReadDataTableFromSqlServerViaStoredProcedureAndRawConnectionString to support passing in connection string
In ReadDataTableFromSqlServerViaStoredProcedureAndRawConnectionString, If empty string in parameter value of type guid we automatically pass Guid.Empty.
In ReadDataTableFromSqlServerViaStoredProcedureAndRawConnectionString, If parameterNames is null then assume call to procedure with no parameters.

Feature: Create Table supports passing in dataset as xml
InsertRow now supports passing dataset as xml
InsertRow version where you pass DataSet now supports passing field and values string lists

Task: Added DataTableColumnToDelimitedString so you could specify the delimiter and choose to pass in xml or DataTable object
Added CopyTable to allow you to copy a table from one DataSet to another'

Feature: Initial version contains common data clases such as CustomFields
Initial version supports JSON to XML and XML to JSON

Task: Provided serialization of an object to  JSON String

Feature: Namspace and class name changed to proper case

Task: Provided deserialization of a JSON String to an object
Relies on MS Practices Dlls. Often better to use CSHARP.Data.SQLServer.Standard unless you need specific functionality.
V1.0.0.0 was actually a combined library of CSHARP.Xml. Split to provide better segmenting.
